text: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

translation.en: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great
translation.id: Milik-Nyalah apa yang ada di langit dan apa yang ada di bumi. Dan Dialah Yang Mahaagung, Mahabesar
